Bewerben

Project Manager (d/f/m)

  • Full or Part Time
  • Hybrid
  • Cottaer Straße 4, 01159 Dresden
  • With Professional Experience
  • 1/9/26

Your role

As a Project Manager (d/f/m), you are responsible for planning, steering and successfully delivering our international customer projects in the semiconductor industry with a focus on integrating IIoT solutions.​

You work closely with our development team and our customers in Europe and Asia and make sure that projects are delivered on time, on budget and in the agreed quality.​

Your responsibilities

  • Project planning & structure: You take ownership of demanding customer projects, define clear goals together with the team and design the roadmap with realistic timelines and resource plans.​
  • Team leadership & collaboration: You lead your project team in day‑to‑day business, assign tasks according to the strengths of the team members, facilitate collaboration and ensure with clear communication that everyone is pulling in the same direction.​
  • Budget & risk: You enjoy decision‑making authority in budget calculation and cost planning, assess project risks at an early stage and implement effective measures to keep your projects on track.​
  • Steering & quality: You manage project progress along clear milestones, take operational decisions where needed and ensure that time, cost and quality targets are measurably achieved for us and our customers.​
  • Communication & closure: You act as the central point of contact for customers and stakeholders, confidently lead workshops and project meetings and ensure transparent documentation for successful go‑lives and clean project closure.​

Are you the one?

  • Degree in engineering or business (e.g. industrial engineering, electrical engineering/computer science, business administration) or a comparable qualification.​
  • At least 3 years of professional experience in project management, ideally in an industrial environment or the software industry.​
  • Experience in the semiconductor industry and/or with equipment, subfab processes or comparable industrial plants is a plus.​
  • Experience with agile methods such as Scrum and Kanban, ideally also with hybrid approaches.​
  • Experience in risk, stakeholder and requirements management as well as in project controlling and management reporting.​
  • Confident handling of common PM tools (e.g. Jira, GitLab, Confluence) and very good MS Office skills to create project plans and reports.​
  • Willingness to travel internationally, primarily for assignments in Europe and Asia.​
  • Good English and German skills (at least level B2).​
  • Structured, analytical and solution‑oriented way of working.​
  • Strong communication and team skills.​
  • Customer‑oriented and professional appearance.​
  • Ability to resolve conflicts even under time pressure and willingness to continuously learn about new topics (e.g. IIoT, data integration).

Are we the ones?

Team & Culture:

  • We appreciate a heterogeneous team with individual personalities and complementing skills
  • Our team has many years of experience in software development, semiconductor manufacturing, subfab processes and environmental technologies
  • We offer flat hierarchies and thus enable everyone to contribute to our aims
  • We value and foster open, constructive and respectful communicatiaon and encourage everyone to help each other
  • We enable you to grow and develop with us
  • We offer you creative freedom regarding working methods
  • We welcome people of all nationalities, religious beliefs, sexual identities and ages

Work & Office:

  • We are based in Dresden, the beautiful capital city of Saxony, a dynamic high-tech cluster in Germany
  • Our office is centrally located with good public transport connections
  • Even though we are a startup founded in 2023, we work in an established environment with long-standing partners
  • We enable flexible time management and remote work
  • We value regular on-site work in a team
  • We offer you a discounted Germany ticket
  • We offer "JobRad-Programm" and secure bicycle parking facilities
  • We offer you regular massages for relaxation

algorismic is committed to improving the world through sustainable business and the use of innovative technologies since 2023. We develop unique, modular software solutions for process visualisation and optimisation that can be seamlessly integrated into existing systems and collect current operating data using IIoT-Technology. Our agile and goal-oriented approaches deliver measurable results quickly, increase energy and resource efficiency and optimise Abatement operations, empowering our customers to be more sustainable and successful.

Feste AnstellungComputer SoftwareEnglischGoprojektmanagementSemiconductorsoftware-developmentSoftwareentwicklung

Standort

Dieser Job bzw. Stellenanzeige als 'Project Manager (d/f/m)' ist für folgende Adressen ausgeschrieben: Cottaer Str. 4, 01159 Dresden.

Kurzprofil der algorismic gmbh

Nachhaltigere Halbleiterproduktion durch IIoT-Lösungen

Die Umweltverträglichkeit von Halbleiterproduktionsprozessen mit Hilfe von IIoT-Lösungen zu verbessern – das ist das Versprechen, mit dem wir seit 2023 die Erreichung der Nachhaltigkeitsziele unserer Kunden unterstützen. Seit der Gründung von algorismic als innovatives Software-StartUp sind wir unaufhaltsam dabei, den „Blind-Spot“ Subfab datentechnisch in die IT-Infrastruktur der Halbleiterfabriken zu integrieren. Dadurch heben wir Einsparpotenziale im Zusammenhang von Energie- und Medienverbräuchen und tragen zur Reduzierung des CO2-Fußabdrucks unserer Kunden bei. Wie wir das schaffen? Mit unserer richtungsweisenden Tech-Expertise, unserem Innovationsgeist und unserem Mindset partnerschaftlicher Zusammenarbeit auf Augenhöhe.
Wir setzen neue Standards in der Branche, den sich dynamisch ändernden Marktbedingungen vor dem Hintergrund wachsender Digitalisierungsanforderungen mit Transparenz und Flexibilität zu begegnen.
